TopicTitle: bugs from ksp1 carry over to ksp2

Articles.Content: after saving and loading, my rocket is completely misaligned and cant fly straight anymore, i remember this happening in ksp1 already, so im wondering where the actual improvements are...
The save/reload of ships in space is very buggy. Very. I had a reload where the kerbal loaded outside the capsule
this was literally why i stopped playing ksp1 - so much for "slaying the kraken" ...
